title: [Netbúnaður] 2x HP Procurve Switch, og Mini-GBIC til sölu.

posts.text:
Tveir HP Procurve Switchar sem eru dottnir úr rekstri.
Til sölu fyrir áhugasama.
ATH, HP Procurve eru einhverjir bestu Switchar sem völ er á !
HP Procurve 2324 Switch - Unmanage
24 porta 10/100 unmanaged Switch.
Lífstíðarábyrgð !
Model Number : (J4818A)
24 porta 10/100 (IEEE 802.3 Type 10Base-T, IEEE 802.3u Type 100Base-TX)
Media Type : AUDO-MDIX
Duplex : half or full
2 open transceiver slots (Gigabit or fiber transceiver slot)
Fylgir með Gigabit Transceiver slot (J4834A) 
Nánari upplýsingar hér : 
http://www.procurve.com/products/access ... essory.htm
Verð : 30.000 kr
HP Procurve 2524 Switch
24 porta 10/100 Manage Switch.
Lífstíðarábyrgð !
Model Number : (J4813A)
* Managed Layer 2 feature set
* 10/100 Connectivity with 24 ports
* Two Gigabit copper or fiber transceiver slots
* Proven reliability
* Industry-leading warranty
* 9.6 Gbps switch fabric integrated on chip: high-performance switch design with a non-blocking architecture
* IEEE 802.3ad Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) and ProCurve trunking: support a single trunk with up to four links (ports)
* Spanning Tree Protocol (IEEE 802.1D): provides redundant links while preventing network loops
* IEEE 802.1w Rapid Convergence Spanning Tree Protocol: increases network uptime through faster recovery from failed links
* IEEE 802.1AB Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP): automated device discovery protocol for easy mapping by network management applications
* ProCurve Auto-MDIX: automatically adjusts for straight-through or crossover cables on all 10/100 ports
* Web interface: allows configuration of the switch from any Web browser on the network
* VLAN support and tagging: support up to 30 port-based VLANs and dynamic configuration of IEEE 802.1Q VLAN tagging, providing security between workgroups
* GARP VLAN Registration Protocol: allows automatic learning and dynamic assignment of VLANs
* Port security: allows access only to specified MAC addresses, which can be learned or specified by the administrator
* IEEE 802.1X and RADIUS network login: control port-based access for authentication and accountability
* RADIUS/TACACS+: eases switch management security administration by using a password authentication server
* IP multicast snooping and data-driven IGMP: automatically prevents flooding of IP multicast traffic
* LLDP Lite: allows for discovery and network topology mapping via HP ProCurve Manager New!
* IEEE 802.1p prioritization: delivers data to devices based on the priority and type of traffic
Gigabit Stacking í Transciever slot og kapall getur fylgt með
 :
Model : J4116 - 
http://www.procurve.com/products/access ... essory.htm
Gigabit Transceiver slot (J4834A) getur fylgt með
 : 
http://www.procurve.com/products/access ... essory.htm
Verð : 60.000kr með báðum Transceivers
Einnig til sölu :
HP Procurve Mini-GBIC 1000BASE-SX SFP til sölu. Ónotað.
Til sölu HP Procurve Mini-GBIC 1000Base-SX SFP.
Part númer er : J4858B
Algjörlega ónotað, og enn í pakkningu með HP innsigli.
Frekari upplýsingar 
hér.
Verð : 25.000kr
Frekari upplýsingar í pm, svavaroe(at)gmail.com, eða GSM : 862 1624
